name: Lapin Amity
description:
A herd of bunnies are living happily one day in the land of Bunnyville. Until monsters suddenly attacked! It is up to you to bring your bunny friends back together to stand strong against these monsters.

Controls:
W / Up Arrow - Move Up
S / Down Arrow - Move Down
A / Right Arrow - Move Left
D / Left Arrow - Move Right

How to play:
- Collect all the bunnies!
- The monsters will die if you have the number of bunnies the same as their health!
- Open gates and bridges using the power of the number of bunnies!
